title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now selectboth P1 and P2.
OB: Notice the Open Project menu item is available butthe Close Project is not.
EB: Either both should be available or neitherone should be enabled.NOTES:
SR: Create two projects P1 and P2. Select P2 and close it.
